questions: Q. 3. What is the other name of voice box ?

answers: Ans. Yes, it travels through all mediums such as solid, liquid and gases.

questions: Q. 6. Write a precaution to prevent eardrum damage.
answers: Ans. Never put a sharp, pointed or hard thing into your ear.
Ans. 1 Hz is one oscillation per second.

questions: Q. 6. What is the unit of loudness. At and after which range noise becomes painful ?
answers: Ans. Decibel, at about 80 dB and afterwards the noise becomes audibly painful.
